title: Appendix 5 - Impact Assessment
purpose: Evaluate potential benefits, harms, and equity impacts of using synthetic health data.

fields.name: publicInterest
fields.label: Describe how the project serves a clear public interest or health benefit.

fields.name: beneficiaries
fields.label: Who stands to benefit and in what way?

fields.name: potentialHarms
fields.label: Identify possible harms (privacy, equity, trust, reputational, social, or cultural).

fields.name: mitigations
fields.label: List measures proposed to minimise or eliminate these harms.

fields.name: communityExpectations
fields.label: Describe how community expectations and transparency have been considered.

fields.name: indigenousData
fields.label: Does this project involve Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander data or contexts? If yes, describe engagement and cultural governance arrangements.

fields.name: resourceImpacts
fields.label: Identify resource or operational impacts on the Data Provider.

fields.name: ethicsRequired
fields.label: Is ethics approval required (HREC or equivalent)?

fields.name: piaRequired
fields.label: Does the proposal trigger a Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA)? Explain rationale.
